participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

dim_yesno_q1.Description: In the past 12 months, have you felt discriminated against: because of your race, ethnicity, or color?  Definition of  ethnicity: groups of people who have the same customs, or origin | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 777 = Don't know; 999 = Refused to answer

dim_yesno_q2.Description: In the past 12 months, have you felt discriminated against: because you are (or your family is) from another country? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 777 = Don't know; 999 = Refused to answer

dim_yesno_q3.Description: In the past 12 months, have you felt discriminated against: because someone thought you were gay, lesbian, or bisexual? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 777 = Don't know; 999 = Refused to answer

dim_yesno_q4.Description: In the past 12 months, have you felt discriminated against: because of your weight? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 777 = Don't know; 999 = Refused to answer

dim_matrix_q1.Description: How often do the following people treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background? Teachers: | 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

dim_matrix_q2.Description: How often do the following people treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background? Other adults outside school: | 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

dim_matrix_q3.Description: How often do the following people treat you unfairly or negatively because of your ethnic background? Other students: | 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

dim_matrix_q4.Description: I feel that others behave in an unfair or negative way toward my ethnic group: | 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

dim_matrix_q5.Description: I feel that I am not wanted in American society: | 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

dim_matrix_q6.Description: I don't feel accepted by other Americans: | 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer

dim_matrix_q7.Description: I feel that other Americans have something against me: | 1 = almost never; 2 = rarely; 3 = sometimes; 4 = often; 5 = very often; 777 = don't know; 999 = refused to answer
